import React from 'react' import {ChakraProvider, Container, Box, Stack, Image, Heading, Text} from '@chakra-ui/react'; const Section7 = () => { return ( Quick and easy account creation Now, you might be thinking that it’s just like any other account creation… Long, tiresome and full of endless blanks to fill in. Well, it’s not.
We have designed the whole process to make it the simplest and the shortest one ever conceived for a personal account. Download the app and see for yourself! ) } export default Section7
